p: A shotgun metagenomics approach was also used to explore the enteric virome diversity of dogs in a caseâ€“control study in Australia ( Moreno et al., 2017). Eight eukaryotic viral families were detected, including Astroviridae, Coronaviridae, Reoviridae, Picornaviridae, Caliciviridae, Parvoviridae, Adenoviridae, and Papillomaviridae. Families Astroviridae, Picornaviridae, and Caliciviridae were found only in dogs with acute diarrhea, with Astroviridae being the most common family identified in this group.
